title: Quarto Kick Off
text:
The people at RStudio, now Posit, have given many gifts to the data community over the years.
When I struggled connecting scripts with data files and plots, the RStudio IDE saved the day.
When I tired of manually pasting together monthly revenue reports for the leadership team, R Markdown took over to automate the process. Later this helped a start-up put daily A/B testing reports into production and a PR team scale press releases to engage global journalists with custom commentary.
And when I began teaching data courses on the side, RStudio Cloud - now Posit Could - saved countless hours of troubleshooting by giving my students pre-configured environments.

title: About
text:
Been working with data for 15+ years.
Recently returned to the US after 7 years abroad.
